articles.description: Larian CEO Swen Vincke gives Baldur's Gates 3 fans a development update as to how the Xbox Series X/S version is progressing along.
articles.content:
Highlights
  • Larian CEO Swen Vincke provides a positive update on the progress of Baldur's Gate 3 for Xbox, assuring fans that the game is still on track for a 2023 release.

articles.title: You Can Get the Google Pixel 7a for Its Lowest Price Ever Right Now - Lifehacker
articles.description: The unlocked Google Pixel 7a is on sale for $125 less than its usual price.
articles.content: The Google Pixel 8 came out on Oct. 12 after a much-anticipated release, and inevitably, this meant that the Google Pixel 7 was bound to come down significantly in price at some point. That moment is… [+1540 chars]
